interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Azure OLD PEEL OFF COLLECTION (Fantasy Collection)
Review Date: 2019/06/23
Store: Azure Cosmetics
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Azure Cosmetics', 'Scent': 'Lavender', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Unit Count': '2.7 Ounce', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 1.5 x 5.5 inches; 10.41 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SG_B07JFDJTGC_US', 'UPC': '689513274407'}
Review Text: These masks are really cute and glittery. They're perfect for a fun girl's night and really pull everything out of your pores, but I'm not the biggest fan of the scents. The strawberry cupcake one is okay, but the other two smell like child's medicine. It doesn't linger once the mask is applied and starts drying so it doesn't bother me too much. Just keep it in mind if you're very sensitive to smells.
Review Title: Cute and Glittery
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Advanced vitamin C serum with natural Antioxidant for fine lines and wrinkles Firm and Youthful formula by Essy Essy ['Essy Beauty Vitamin C Serum is the natural way to obtain younger looking skin without any harsh chemicals.', "Vitamin C is known for its anti-oxidant properties that are powerful and effective in repairing and protecting skin from UV damage and pollutants. It's an industry recognized ingredient that diminishes years of wrinkles and fine lines for a smoother and more beautiful complexion.", 'Benefits:', '-Reverse UV damage -Lighten dark spots and acne scars -Repair skin -Reduce wrinkles and fine lines -Prevent further hyper pigmentation -Increase collagen production -Even out skin tone -Prevent acne breakouts -Gentle enough for sensitive skin', 'Directions:', 'Cleanse and dry your face and neck. After toner, massage a small amount of Essy Beauty Vitamin C Serum to your face, neck and décolleté until fully absorbed. Follow with your regular moisturizer. For best results, we recommend using this serum every night before bedtime.', 'Caution:', 'For external use only. Do not apply to irritated or damaged skin. Avoid direct contact with eyes. Patch test on skin before first use. If skin irritation occurs, stop use. Keep out of reach of children and pets. Please store in a cool place.'] {'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Use for': 'Neck, Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Essy', 'Unit Count': '1.02 Fl Oz', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.4 x 3.1 x 1.6 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '736631212993'} I've been using this serum twice a week for the last 3 weeks and my skin feels great.
Almost immediately after putting it on my pores become visibly smaller. The discoloration and redness on my cheeks and forehead are much less visible in the morning if I use it at night.
This serum works just as well as the high-end ones and is at a much more reasonable price.
I'm definitely recommending this brand to all my friends. Great Inexpensive Serum Beauty Glazed Gorgeous Me Eyeshadow Palette Matte Professional 63 Colors Eyeshadow Cosmetic Matte Eyeshadow Cream +Makeup Brushes Set and Powder Blender Sponge Beauty Glazed {'Color': 'B37-63 Shades', 'Brand': 'Beauty Glazed', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Travel size, Matte', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.79 x 3.9 x 0.59 inches; 13.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '711796032686', 'Manufacturer': 'Beauty Glazed'} This palette doesn't have all the qualities of a high end eyeshadow palette, but it is one of the best low cost palettes I've gotten before.
I love the range and variety of colors in this palette. All of the shimmers are highly pigmented and the matted come out great on the eye. The more vibrant shimmers do have a lot of fallout so I'd suggest using a shadow shield or doing your foundation and concealer after so you can cover it up. Also I would highly recommend using your finger or a sponge tip brush to apply the shimmers and pack on the color. Great Budget Friendly Palette Azure OLD PEEL OFF COLLECTION (Fantasy Collection) Azure Cosmetics {'Brand': 'Azure Cosmetics', 'Scent': 'Lavender', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Unit Count': '2.7 Ounce', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 1.5 x 5.5 inches; 10.41 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SG_B07JFDJTGC_US', 'UPC': '689513274407'} These masks are really cute and glittery. They're perfect for a fun girl's night and really pull everything out of your pores, but I'm not the biggest fan of the scents. The strawberry cupcake one is okay, but the other two smell like child's medicine. It doesn't linger once the mask is applied and starts drying so it doesn't bother me too much. Just keep it in mind if you're very sensitive to smells. Cute and Glittery
profile:
**User Profile Summary Updated:**

- **Skincare Focus:** User prioritizes effective skincare products targeting signs of aging, such as fine lines and wrinkles, while also enjoying cosmetics that enhance beauty.
- **Ingredient Preference:** Favors natural, chemical-free formulations in skincare, with a notable interest in Vitamin C for its antioxidant and skin repair benefits. The user is open to experimenting with makeup products that offer variety and creativity.
- **Product Performance:** Values products that visibly improve skin texture, tone, and reduce redness or discoloration. High pigmentation in makeup for vibrant application is especially appreciated.
- **Application Habits:** Uses skincare products consistently and applies makeup methodically to ensure optimal results, specifically recommending techniques for better application.
- **Value-Based Purchasing:** Seeks high-quality products at reasonable prices, often comparing them with high-end alternatives. Recent interactions show an appreciation for budget-friendly cosmetics and a willingness to enjoy fun and themed products.
- **Recommendation Tendencies:** Likely to recommend effective beauty products to friends, reflecting a social aspect in their shopping habits, including both skincare and makeup.
- **Skin Type:** Prefers products suited for dry, sensitive skin and enjoys gentle formulations. Values versatile products that complement both skincare and cosmetic routines, though is mindful of scents in products.

Overall, user maintains a clear trend towards enhancing appearance through fun, quality products that are effective, affordable, and aligned with their desire for ingredient integrity.
